"The Team Shop":
"About the Team Shop

The Team Shop allows Managers and the Team Master to spend Team Points on items for the Team. Items purchased for team members are sent to the Team Counter.

Items cannot be purchased for members who have not logged in for over 30 days, or who joined the Team within the last 7 days, and Team Points will not be spent on those members.
